name: meteorically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that develops very fast and attracts a lot of attention: rise meteorically She rose meteorically in the jazz world in her 20s. New office blocks are soaring up on every side, and property prices have risen meteorically.
More examplesFewer examplesAustralian stocks have risen meteorically in the London markets.The number of football clubs has been rising meteorically as well.She has risen meteorically from humble beginnings in a refugee camp, to a student leader in her university.
